content: espresso shot shortie socks by cheryl ham indie dyer behind hypnoticyarn com shortie socks are to sock knitters what espresso is to caffeine seekers instant gratification okay so maybe they re not instant but they sure are fast fun and gratifying this simple vanilla shortie sock is designed to knit up quickly while letting that special hand-dyed colorway you know that one you ve been hoarding shine ©cheryl ham 2017 www hypnoticyarn com size this is my personal shortie sock recipe that fits my us size 7 foot and should also fit women s us sizes 6 5 8 the knitter should have a basic understanding of sock construction as you may need to cast on more or less sts than what is called for in pattern to fit smaller or larger sizes what you ll need yarn approximately 30 grams fingering weight yarn in main color and approximately 15 grams of contrasting color for heels and toes yarn used in pattern photos is hypnotic yarn s awesome sox base 80/20 superwash bfl/nylon cuff leg and foot in colorway good morning and contrasting heels and toe in colorway faded blue jeans needles us size 1 2 25mm or size to obtain gauge 9 inch circulars or long circular for magic loop i suggest 32 40 inch cord if using magic loop method gauge 7 ½ stitches per inch after blocking in stockinette stitch materials an extra set of long circular needles in same size or dpn s for heel and toe decreases stitch marker tapestry needle length of waste yarn in same weight used for sock about 3 5 yards abbreviations ©cheryl ham 2017 www hypnoticyarn com cuff cast on 60 sts using long tail method place marker and join for working in the round being careful not to twist sts if using magic loop split sts in half with 30 sts on each needle work in 2x2 rib for 10 rnds leg switch to stockinette st knit all sts for 10 rnds add waste yarn for heel placement at beginning of next round drop the working yarn but leave it attached do not cut working yarn drape the waste yarn under the front needle leaving a long tail in the front of your work leaving the tail exposed in front will make it easier to remove the waste yarn later with waste yarn knit across the first 30 sts if using magic loop you ll be knitting across all stitches on needle 1 tip if you d prefer the first 30 sts make up the instep the front of your foot instead of the heel you can place the waste yarn on the last 30 sts instead if using magic loop it d be all sts on needle 2 for 9 in circular and magic loop methods you now need to slip the 30 sts you just knit back onto the left hand needle next drop the waste yarn again
